name: 真乃
text: ……はぁ、はぁ……どう、かな？
trans: ...Haa, haa... how, was that?

name: めぐる
text:
──うん！　今の、すっごく良かった！
真乃、ちゃんと掴めてきてるよっ
trans: Alright! That was really good! Mano, you're really getting the feel of it!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ、め、めぐるちゃんっ
私、汗かいてるから、くっつかない方が……
trans: Really? Me-Meguru, I'm all sweaty so you shouldn't cling to me...

name: めぐる
text:
えへへー！　そんなの気にならないよ！
──特訓の成果、出てきてるね！
trans: Ehehe! I don't mind it at all! Your secret training has really paid off!

name: 真乃
text: めぐるちゃんのおかげだよっ
trans: It's all thanks to you.

name: めぐる
text:
よーし、じゃあ今日はもうちょっと頑張っちゃおうか！
……でもその前に、一旦休憩にしよう！
trans: Alright, then let's try even harder for today! ...But before that, let's first have a break!

name: 真乃
text: あ、じゃあ、何か飲み物買ってくるね
trans: Ah, then, I'll go buy some drinks.

name: めぐる
text: えっ、いいよ！　そんな気を遣わなくても──
trans: Eh, it's alright! You don't have to be so──

name: 真乃
text:
お礼、させてほしいんだっ
待ってて、めぐるちゃん
trans: I want to do something as thanks, so wait for me, Meguru.

name: 灯織
text: （……あれって……）
trans: (...is that?)

name: 灯織
text: 櫻木さん……？
trans: Sakuragi...?

name: 真乃
text:
ひ、灯織ちゃんっ？
どうしたの？　今日、お休みだったんじゃ──
trans: H-Hiori? What's the matter? Isn't it a off day today──

name: 灯織
text:
プロデューサーから、
臨時レッスンだって聞いてて……
trans: I heard from Producer, that there's a special lesson...

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ？　臨時レッスン？　私、なんにも聞いてなくて……
……あれっ。でも今日は私ずっとここを使う予定で──
trans: Really? A special lesson? I didn't hear anything about it... Huh? But I was supposed to use the room for the whole day──

name: 灯織
text: えっと……櫻木さん、大丈夫？
trans: Umm... Sakuragi, are you alright?

name: 灯織
text:
……慌てなくていいよ
……えっと……どこか行くところだった？
trans:
...You don't have to rush...
Umm... Are you going somewhere?

name: 真乃
text: あの、ね……飲み物を買いに……
trans: Umm, see... I was about to go buy some drinks...

name: 真乃
text:
……ひ、灯織ちゃん！
ちょっとだけ、付き合ってもらってもいい……？
trans: ...H-Hiori! Can you accompany me just for a little while...?

name: 真乃
text:
今日はね、プロデューサーさんにお願いして、
レッスン場を使わせてもらってたんだ
trans: You see, I asked Producer and got permission to use the lesson room today.

name: 真乃
text:
私、できないことが多いから……
たくさん練習しなきゃって思って
trans: There's a lot of things I can't do... That's why I feel that I have to practice a lot.

name: 灯織
text: そう……なんだ
trans: Is... Is that so?

name: 真乃
text:
さっき、やっと上手くできたんだよっ
めぐるちゃんも、褒めてくれたんだ
trans: Just now, I finally managed to do it well. Meguru praised me too.

name: 真乃
text:
早く、ふたりと同じ場所に立ちたいって思ってたから……
ちょっとだけ近づけた気がして、すごく嬉しいの
trans: I want to hurry and be able to stand alongside the two of you... That's why I'm really happy, now that I feel that I'm a little closer to my goal.

name: 真乃
text:
ふたりに並べるように……いつか、ふたりと一緒に
歩けるように、私、これからも頑張るねっ
trans: So that I can stand with you two... so that someday, I can walk together with the both of you. I'll continue to do my best from here on out.

name: 灯織
text: 待って！
trans: Wait!

name: 真乃
trans: Huh?

name: 灯織
text:
……櫻木さんが、並べてないなんてこと、ない
私たちは、ちゃんと同じ場所に立ってるよ
trans: ...Sakuragi, don't say that you can't stand alongside us. We've always been standing at the same line.

name: 灯織
text: 櫻木さんだけ追いついてないみたいに……言わないで
trans: Don't say it... like you are the only one who can't catch up.

name: 真乃
text: で、でも……
trans: B-But...

name: 灯織
text: 櫻木さん……本当に、ごめんなさい
trans: Sakuragi... I'm really sorry.

name: 真乃
text: え。えっ？
trans: H-Huh?

name: 灯織
text:
謝らなくちゃいけないことがたくさんある
……レッスンの時のこと
trans: There's a lot that I have to apologize for... like what happened during the lesson.

name: 灯織
text: 私、いつもきつく言っちゃって……
trans: I've always been overly harsh...

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そんなっ、灯織ちゃんはアドバイスしてくれただけで、
謝ることじゃないよっ
trans: Th-That's not true, you were just giving me advice, there's nothing to apologize about.

name: 灯織
text: ううん。私、全然言い方を考えられてなかった
trans: No, I've never considered the way I say things.

name: 灯織
text:
……それに、櫻木さんのことも誤解してた
八宮さんのことも
trans: ...Also, I've been mistaken about you both too.

name: 灯織
text:
……あんなふうにきつく言ってばかりだったから、
私と練習するの、嫌になっちゃうんじゃないかって
trans: ...Because of all the harsh things I said, I thought that maybe the two of you started disliking having to practice with me.

name: 灯織
text:
……ふたりのこと、全然わかってなかった
もしかしたら諦めちゃうかもって、勝手に心配して……
trans: ...I didn't understand the two of you at all. I started worrying on my own about how you two might quit...

name: 灯織
text:
ふたりの、アイドルになりたいっていう気持ち、
信じられてなかった
trans: I didn't trust your feelings of wanting to become an idol...

name: 灯織
text: ……本当に、ごめんなさい
trans: I'm really sorry about that.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そんなこと！　そんなこと全然気にしてないよっ
灯織ちゃんの気持ちに追いつけてなかったのは本当だし……
trans: Th-That... that doesn't bother me at all! It's true that I wasn't able to keep up with your feelings...

name: 真乃
text:
私、落ち込んじゃうばっかりで、
灯織ちゃんと全然お話できてなかった
trans: All I ever did was feel dejected, I wasn't able to talk to you at all.

name: 真乃
text:
こういうことっ、ほんとは話しておかなきゃなのに、
上手くできなくて……！
trans: Even though we should talk about such things, I wasn't able to do it...!

name: 真乃
text:
あの、えっと、とにかく、
私、灯織ちゃんと練習するの、嫌なんかじゃないよっ
trans: Umm, umm, anyway, I don't dislike practicing with you at all.

name: 灯織
text: …………ありがとう、櫻木さん
trans: Thank you, Sakuragi.

name: 真乃
text:
……うんっ。ごめんね、灯織ちゃん
ありがとう
trans: ...Yeah, I'm sorry. Thank you, Hiori.

name: 灯織
text:
私、これからもっと……もっと頑張る
ふたりに、恥ずかしくないように
trans: From here on out... I'll try even harder, so as to not let the two of you down.

name: 灯織
text: ……ふたりに、負けないように
trans: ...So as to not, lose to the two of you.

name: 真乃
text: ──うんっ、私も負けないよ
trans: Yeah, I won't lose too.

name: 真乃
text:
……ね、灯織ちゃん。この後、一緒に練習できないかな？
特訓の成果、見てもらいたいんだ
trans: ...Say, Hiori. After this, can we practice together? I want you to see the results of my practice.

name: 灯織
text: ……うん
trans: Sure.

name: めぐる
text: も～っ！　真乃、おっそーい！
trans: Oh! Mano, you're so slow!

name: めぐる
text:
……って、あれ？　灯織？
なんでー！？
trans: ...Wait, huh? Hiori? Why!?

name: 真乃
text: ええっと……臨時レッスン、かな？
trans: Ummm... Special lesson, I suppose?

name: 灯織
text:
今から、私も一緒にやらせてほしい
さ！　休憩は終わり。レッスン、始めよう？
trans: Let me join in as well. All right! The break is over. Let's continue with the training.
